title: Refunding Issue
body: I went to refund Zed but I couldn't as I can't scroll to see my older purchases. I bought him like a couple months ago now I can't seem to refund him. Please help thnx

replies.body: Looks like you haven't used any of your refund tokens yet so that shouldn't be a problem. Hit up our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help out.
